item.title: [pi]help with pkbox wild level![help]
item.dc:creator: @ctk ctk
item.description:
@ctk wrote:

ok so i just added a pk box to my server nd its AWESOME only problem is its level -62 wild!! its realy annoying heres what i have

[QUOTE] /**
* PkBox
*/
public boolean inPkBox = false;
[/QUOTE]

in wild mines the last 1

[QUOTE] public boolean inWild() {
if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3966 ||
absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10366 || absX > 2510 && absX < 2545 && absY > 4764 && absY < 4795 || absX > 3241 && absX < 3255 && absY > 9354 && absY < 9375) {
return true;
}
return false;[/QUOTE]

the boolean

[QUOTE] public boolean inPkBox() {
if(absX > 3241 && absX < 3255 && absY > 9354 && absY < 9375) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
[/QUOTE]

i also added this in client.java

[QUOTE] } else if (inPkBox()) {
wildLevel = 12;
getPA().walkableInterface(197);
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);[/QUOTE]

still ses level -62 someone please help!

Read full topic
